••••8th Year In Business Sale! ••••

Hosting that works out of the box. We're continually growing and now 8+ years strong! Take S-1 for $20/year!



••••Start Saving Money••••

How many times have you paid for a service at a high rate and wondered, what did I just really pay for?

That's exactly how we don't want you to feel. Hi! We're 10 Gigs and we promise that you won't
  • Pay for extra addons that you don't need
  • You won't be paying for our overhead costs
  • No hidden fees
  • No costs for friendly helpful support !

So how come our pricing is really low compared to others' offers?

Simply put, we offer reliable hosting at the fraction of the cost of some of the 'other' guys because we don't attend to our support/sales channel 24/7. By reducing the costs of providing technical support round the clock, we've eliminated a good chunk of our expenses, all savings that we pass onto you!


••••24 x 7 x 365 LIMITED Support••••

Wait? What? Did I just read that correctly? Yes you did.

We do things a bit differently. We offer amazingly reliable hosting, but we don't offer 24/7 technical support.

Can you still get a hold of us? Absolutely.
Will you have to wait long hours? We aim to reply to every e-mail within 3 hours, but we don't guarantee our response times. On average, most of our tickets are replied to within the hour its received during normal business hours.

So exactly how often do we check our support desk? We have incoming e-mails that get routed all day long, we try our best to attend to it throughout the day, however, we won't be as bold to say we average less than 10 minutes to answer a ticket. Because honesty counts right?…


••••100% White Label••••

All of our hostnames, e-mail servers, and name servers are completely brand-free and generic. Rest assured that our service is 100% White label.


••••99% Uptime Guarantee & 14 Day Money Back Guarantee••••

99% Uptime backed by SLA, and a 14 Day Money Back policy. If you're unhappy with our services, feel confident that you have up to 14 days to request a refund. No questions asked!

••••Frequently Asked Questions••••


Q: I am migrating from my old host, will you assist in the transfer?
A: Upload a full backup of your site(s) to us, and we'll help in restoring them


Q: Where are your servers located?
A: We're located in the colo4 Datacenter in Dallas, TX.


Q:How long does it take to setup my account?
A: If your order passes our fraud tests, it will be setup instantly. Welcome e-mail is usually sent within 5 minutes of the order being paid for. If your order does not pass our fraud check, one of our account representatives will have to manually setup the order and this may take up to 24 hours.
